Title: Relates to the payment of property taxes to municipalities by hospitals considered nonprofit organizations
Summary: Relates to the payment of property taxes to municipalities by hospitals considered nonprofit organizations; requires hospitals that would typically be exempt from property taxes based on nonprofit status to pay 75 percent of its annual property taxes to the municipality in which it sits in order to offset the impact of the exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the payment of property taxes to municipalities by hospitals considered nonprofit organizations
